creator: Higher Education Strategy Associates
title: 2.31: Korean Higher Education
author: Higher Education Strategy Associates
content:encoded: Today's guest today is Dr. Jisun Jung of the University of Hong Kong. She is an expert in Korean higher education and the discussion today ranges from the post-war history of higher education to the very real and immanent challenges that institutions are facing with respect to declining enrolment.
